name: Basil Lemonade
comments: This is a refreshing variation on lemonade; the subtleties of lime and basil really add pop! Less lime can be added depending on how tart you like it.
ingredients: 1/2-1 tsp. limeade concentrate (or 1/4 c. fresh lime juice)
instructions: Pour lemonade concentrate into pitcher; add 3 cans water and stir. Add limeade and basil, stir and let sit overnight. Remove leaves and serve.
